title: TheBeardedBaby
author: TheBeardedBaby
content: How quickly the time has passed, I can clearly remember the time I was browsing the forum during my vacation, lying on the sunbed next to the pool and reading some old posts of satoshi and decided to create an account here. Those 5 years were incredible, made a lot of new anonymous friends (and less enemies), a lot of fun times, had a lot of fun chasing the spammies and manage to reach legendary rank!Thank you theymos (and the team) for keeping this amazing world alive and holding it strong together for so many years!I hope the next 5 years will be full with the same excitement! Thank you friends!! With love,TBB

comments.author: TheBeardedBaby
comments.body: Quote from: shahzadafzal on November 07, 2022, 08:03:11 AMWhere's the cake?HBD.There you go

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: TheBeardedBaby on November 07, 2022, 07:57:12 AMHow quickly the time has passed, I can clearly remember the time I was browsing the forum during my vacation, lying on the sunbed next to the pool and reading some old posts of satoshi and decided to create an account here. Those 5 years were incredible, made a lot of new anonymous friends (and less enemies), a lot of fun times, had a lot of fun chasing the spammies and manage to reach legendary rank!Thank you theymos (and the team) for keeping this amazing world alive and holding it strong together for so many years!I hope the next 5 years will be full with the same excitement! Thank you friends!! With love,TBB Congrats. Nice to see a member I'm older than having a higher forum rank than me. But I wonder, which would you rather have, the power to control Bitcoin price and do other interesting things or a higher forum rank and merit?

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Happy Birthday- glad you’ve enjoyed your time on the forum and I’ve enjoyed reading a lot of your topics/threads. Enjoy your day

comments.author: devil2man
comments.body: An excellent result congratulations, happy birthday

comments.author: Lak93xy
comments.body: Happy Birthday! May your satoshi bag grow bigger!
